description: Les Anges Gardins is an initiative focused on popular education and integration through economic activity, primarily in organic market gardening. Established to address food insecurity and promote social justice, it aims to create sustainable local food systems. By structuring supply chains and supporting community engagement, the initiative fosters food accessibility and well-being. Through collaboration with various stakeholders, it seeks to redefine economic models and enhance food citizenship, ultimately contributing to healthier diets and social inclusion.
name: Les Anges Gardins
